trans-unit.source: Defines a descriptor for a Service Provider SSO (SPSSO).
trans-unit.target: 定義服務提供者 SSO (SPSSO) 的描述元。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Metadata.ServiceProviderSingleSignOnDescriptor"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Metadata.ServiceProviderSingleSignOnDescriptor"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Metadata.ServiceProviderSingleSignOnDescriptor"></xref> class that has the specified dictionary of indexed endpoints.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Metadata.ServiceProviderSingleSignOnDescriptor"></xref>類別具有指定之索引的端點的字典。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Metadata.IndexedProtocolEndpointDictionary"></xref> that contains the indexed endpoints that support the profiles of the Authentication Request protocol that is defined in [SAMLProf].
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Metadata.IndexedProtocolEndpointDictionary"> </xref> ，包含支援的驗證要求的通訊協定 [SAMLProf] 中所定義的設定檔的索引的端點。

trans-unit.source: The dictionary typically should contain one or more elements.
trans-unit.target: 字典通常應包含一個或多個項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether requests sent by the service provider will be signed.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否會簽署服務提供者所傳送的要求。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if authentication requests sent by the service provider will be signed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果服務提供者所傳送的驗證要求將會簽署;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether assertions received by the service provider should be signed.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否應該登入服務提供者所接收的判斷提示。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if assertions received by the service provider should be signed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果判斷提示所接收的服務提供者應該簽署;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
